DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , randomize , single-dose , 2-way crossover , relative bioavailability study perform 40 healthy adult male subject . As per protocol , enough healthy , adult , human subject enrol study allow dose 40 subject first period . 40 subject enrol total 37 subject complete period study .
